value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">20</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">It was at half past two in 
            <choice>
              <sic>th</sic>
              <corr>the</corr>
            </choice> afternoon that the</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">trumpets 
            <choice>
              <sic>dounded</sic>
              <corr>sounded</corr>
            </choice> and the flag flew over the Theatre.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The playhouse was open to the sky. A penny or twopence was</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the price of a seat. There was no scenery; but the walls</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">were painted; and the actors were richly dressed, according</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">to one spectator in the cast off robes of the nobles, sold</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">by their servants. What other amusement 
            <choice>
              <sic>as</sic>
              <corr>was</corr>
            </choice> there in the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">afternoon, for the gentlement of the court, txxx of the Inns</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">of Court, for the numbers of captains and soldiers about</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">London? Only the amusements that Latimer deplored;</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">carding, dicing, gaming, following of xmxmxmxmxmx</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">harlots and drinking. The rivxmxmxmxmx audience came from</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the 
            <choice>
              <sic>drowded</sic>
              <corr>crowded</corr>
            </choice> festering little streets txxxx round <rs type="place" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#pla-stpa" key="St Paul's Cathedral">St Pauls</rs></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">where the buried smelt so strong. The river was crowded with</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">wherries ferrying them across: The riverside people 
            <choice>
              <sic>depnded</sic>
              <corr>depended</corr>
            </choice></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">upon their fares. The flag flew; the trumpets 
            <choice>
              <sic>dsounded</sic>
              <corr>sounded</corr>
            </choice>; and</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
            <choice>
              <sic>audince</sic>
              <corr>audience</corr>
            </choice> crowded into the open playhouse, clustered round the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">stage; and heard:</l>

<quote xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" source="#" rend="block">
            <l>Brother Cosroe, I find myself aggrieved,</l>
            <l>Yet insufficient 
              <choice>
                <sic>yto</sic>
                <corr>to</corr>
              </choice> express the same;</l>
            <l>For it requires a great and thundering speech</l>
          </quote>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">At last the voice speaks from the actual body of one man.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">xmxmxmxmxm.And the 
            <choice>
              <sic>wolrd</sic>
              <corr>world</corr>
            </choice> became visible. Egypt, Libya;</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Persia; Greece. It unrolled itself <add hand="ms" place="above">time</add>; and the armies of 
            <choice>
              <sic>gr at</sic>
              <corr>great</corr>
            </choice></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Kings; and plains; and palaces. There is no abstraction any</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">longer. All is visible tangible, audible. Txmxmxmxmxm</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
            <choice>
              <sic>ords</sic>
              <corr>Words</corr>
            </choice> seem to swell and stretch and tumble over 
            <choice>
              <sic>themslves</sic>
              <corr>themselves</corr>
            </choice></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">in the effort to give body to this vast universe.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">They can scarcely contain all they would bring forward.</l>
